reviewText:
I bought this for my grandchildren and they loved it! I recommend it if you small children..Great kid movie.....
....

My great grandson starting watching these videos when he was only 6 or 7 months old.  Have been a great entertainment for him.  His mother had to travel aways everyday to the baby sitter and she got him a portable DVD player and that kept him quite the whole time.  Much easier on the nerves.
